apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two women sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and smooth, glossy 3D shading.  The darker skin tones are portrayed with subtle gradients and a rich depth, conveying warmth and intimacy.  The soft, rounded edges of their faces and the gentle curve of their lips evoke a sense of loving connection, making it a powerful visual representation of same-sex affection and romance on Apple platforms.
